divs: sighting detailssighting report: daate: june 16\2005 time: 10:30pm temp: 12 degrees celsius conditions: dusk like sky with dark storm clouds... thunder storm like conditions... no rain. barometric pressure: 100 and rising i was stopped at a light at the intersection of paris street and brady street, when i noticed a bright blueish white light that was circular in shape decend from the storm clouds and momentarily paused in mid decent for a second or two. it then rose gradually into the clouds agin in a westerlly direction.it seemed to get about 100 yards below cloud level at its lowest point and about the size of a small plane. out of this world!!!!!!!! made me a believer!
